mapper.select: select count(*) from tblCWC cwc join tblCourse c on cwc.course_seq = c.course_seq join tblCWCWin w on w.course_seq = c.course_seq join tblCWCFinalWin fw on fw.course_seq = c.course_seq

select count(*) from tblCWC cwc join tblCourse c on cwc.course_seq = c.course_seq join tblCWCWin w on w.course_seq = c.course_seq join tblCWCFinalWin fw on fw.course_seq = c.course_seq where cwc.is_test = 'Y'

select * from ( select n.*, rownum as rnum FROM ( select c.*, cwc.is_test, w.cwc_match_count, w.cwc_win_count, fw.cwc_final_win_count from tblCWC cwc join tblCourse c on cwc.course_seq = c.course_seq join tblCWCWin w on w.course_seq = c.course_seq join tblCWCFinalWin fw on fw.course_seq = c.course_seq ) n ) where rnum between #{startIndex} and #{endIndex}
mapper.insert: insert into tblCourse (course_seq, name, img) values (seqtblCourse.nextVal, #{name}, #{img})
insert into tblCWC (cwc_seq, is_test, course_seq) values (seqtblCWC.NEXTVAL, 'Y', #{course_seq})
insert into tblCWCWin (cwc_win_seq, cwc_match_count, cwc_win_count, course_seq) values (seqtblCWCWin.NEXTVAL, 0, 0, #{course_seq})
insert into tblCWCFinalWin (cwc_final_win_seq, cwc_final_win_count, course_seq) values (seqtblCWCFinalWin.NEXTVAL, 0, #{course_seq})
mapper.select: select max(course_seq) as course_seq from tblCourse
select count(*) from tblCourse where name = #{name}
select sum(cwc_final_win_count) as total_cwc_final_win_count from tblCWCFinalWin
mapper.update: update tblCourse set name = #{name}, img = #{img} where course_seq = #{course_seq}
mapper.select: select img from tblCourse where course_seq = #{course_seq}

select c.*, cwc.is_test, w.cwc_match_count, w.cwc_win_count, fw.cwc_final_win_count from tblCWC cwc join tblCourse c on cwc.course_seq = c.course_seq join tblCWCWin w on w.course_seq = c.course_seq join tblCWCFinalWin fw on fw.course_seq = c.course_seq where cwc.is_test = 'Y'
mapper.update: update tblCWCWin set cwc_match_count = cwc_match_count + 1 where course_seq = #{courseSeq}
update tblCWCWin set cwc_win_count = cwc_win_count + 1 where course_seq = #{courseSeq}
update tblCWCFinalWin set cwc_final_win_count = cwc_final_win_count + 1 where course_seq = #{courseSeq}
